Mir hat dieses Spiel sehr viel Freude bereitet. 
Manchmal aber auch wirklich Geduld gekostet. 

Ich würde dieses Spiel jeden empfehlen, der sehr gern nachdenkt und wirklich die nötige Geduld hat, wenn es mall nicht auf Anhieb klappt.
Die Story hat einen netten Aufbau. Nicht nur, dass du die Rätsel (oder wie Glados sagt: Die Tests) lösen musst von Level zu Level gehst, wagst du auch mall gewagte Ausbruch versuche aus den Testkammern und erfährst auch nebenbei etwas über die Geschichte des Labors.

Der Multiplayer hat mir und meinen Coop Partner auch sehr gut gefallen. Die Hauptaufgaben sind nach wie vor 
das lösen der rätsel. Nur ist mann gewissermaßen auf seinen Coop Partner Angeweisten um wirklich alle Test zu besten.
Hast du dann denn Test bestanden kannst du auch Lustige Animationen machen wie deinen Partner Hallo sagen oder Schwere, Setin ,Papier spielen.

Meine Farziet:
Ich würde es noch mal spielen !
If you're looking for a puzzle game to play with friends this is probably one of the most chalanging games you'll find.

I am *in love*.

After playing the first Portal I wasn't very certain whether the sequel would rise to the challenge. There was something about the simplicity of the game, the lovely GLaDOS sarcasm/blatant lies and the plot twists which seemed repeatable, but not improvable. I was a bit worried that Portal 2 would be a repeat of Portal, only bigger. I resigned myself to it and decided to play it anyway. 

Luckily, I was wrong, although at first I was still sure I was being cheated. After all, the first few test chambers are carbon copies of Portal test chambers (trust me on this one, I re-played Portal right before starting Portal 2). I was about to complain before I realized that I Wasn't Getting It, because it was obviously a stylistic choice, a sort of "Previously, on Portal" combined with "Yup, this is going to be about history. Prepare for a ride."

Oh yeah, the game is about history - the history of Apperture, the history of GLaDOS, the history of the facility. And it's done just right - with the perfect amount of fun, sarcasm, disappointment and twists to keep me glued to the screen (and to keep *you* glued, I assume, but who knows). I mean, seriously, the puzzles are great, but the story? I am hooked here. Definitely played it for the sheer fun.

The only issues I have with it is that some of the puzzles were a bit... well, not sure if they were *hard puzzles* per se, but they were hard to figure out because of not being able to see details of the scenery properly. For example, I couldn't find spots to put the portal on (I shot *at* them, but the portal didn't catch and I thought that meant they were unusable surfaces and tried other solutions again... and again... and until I went through a walkthrough). 

One or two of the puzzles were hard in and of themselves, enough to make me wander about for many long minutes (you know the feeling, right?) But that isn't quite so bad. Except for being frustrating. Very frustrating. 

9.5, only deducting 0.5 from its sheer perfection because from time to time I stared blankly at tricky walls that weren't meant to be tricky.

By far one of the best games Valve has ever made and they have an impressive list to start with! It's witty, complex, intriguing, and addictive as all hell. The only flaw is that the single player mode feels incredibly short, but that is easily made up for with all the player made levels you'll find in the workshop. If you've never played this game, your life is incomplete.

This game is great. It pulls me in. Makes me wonder where the facility came from and why things went wrong. Didn't realize that a story could be so interesting without tons of cut scenes and obvious plots. The creators of this game did something awesome: assumed that their customers weren't dumb. It really makes for a more immersive experience. I feel like I'm in the story instead of being told a story between gameplay sessions.
An amazing game to say the least. Great story, amazing humor, outstanding gameplay, great puzzles, good price, get this game ASAP.

Просто неймовірна

Спасибі Valve - Ви як завжди на висоті
Ігру рекомендую всім охочим весело провести час та заодно розрухати "сіру речовину"

Рекомендую всім, хто незнайомий зі дивовижним світом відеоігор, але все ж хотів би його скуштувати - сміло робіть перший укус саме з Portal. Це і сюжет (без спойлерів), і геймплей, і механіка, і графіка

Рекомендую всім, кому ігролад останніх років почав втрачати смак. 
БІжиш туди - убиваєш сотню мобів/ботів - рятуєш світ - PROFIT! 
Схема зрозуміла, але вже дость приїлась. У Portal все інакше.
І це "інакше" не тонкість інді-забавки, де впродовж ігри присутнє стійке "Що воно взагалі та як його їсти?!". Ні - Portal це свіжість ментолу крізь екран монітору.

Беріть одразу дві копії - і дивуйтесь, які у Вас розумні друзі ... чи не дуже. В любому випадку буде весело!

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games I've ever played. It's amazingly atmospheric and is full of hilarious moments and great characters. It is fun from beginning to end in single and multiplayer and you always figure out the puzzles just as you're about to give up. Very few games have me coming back to play and replay them again and again, but Portal 2 keeps drawing me back in. Two words: PLAY IT.
